dishes.name: Garlic Bread Loaf
dishes.desc: Open-faced load of ciabatta bread with garlic butter schmear. Try it with melted mozzarella or add Pizza sauce!

dishes.name: Marinara & Meatballs
dishes.desc: (4) house-made, hand rolled Tagliani Meatballs with your choice of sauce.

dishes.name: Today's Soup
dishes.desc: New way, Every day - Clam Chowder Friday!

dishes.name: Minestrome
dishes.desc: Comforting and hearty Italian vegetable soup with beans, onions, celery, carrots, chicken stock, and tomatoes. Served in Cup or Bowl.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.desc: Tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, and balsamic reduction sauce.

dishes.name: Antipasto Salad
dishes.desc: Mixed greens, pepperoni, prosciutto, macaroni, mozzarella, melon, artichokes, and olives with Italian dressing.

dishes.name: Shrimp Roll
dishes.desc: Rock Shrimp in lemon aioli, lettuce, and tomato on a hoagie roll.

dishes.name: Chicken Parmesan Sandwich
dishes.desc: Mama's Chicken Parmesan sandwich perched up high on top of a cozy nest of marinara and melted mozzarella, on a fresh baked bun or choice of bread, add basil and Parmesan.

dishes.name: Calamari Fritti
dishes.desc: Calamari strips breaded with crispy panko, served with Spicy cocktail & marinara or Mediterranean style (Lemon-caper butter, Kalamata Olives, and Feta Cheese).

dishes.name: Lobster Mac & Cheese
dishes.desc: 5 oz. Lobster meat swimming in our Cheddar-fredo, macaroni pasta, and topped with melted Cheddar cheese. Includes a soup or salad option.

dishes.name: Chocolate Chip Canolis & Cookies
dishes.desc: Crispy Canoli shell with fresh sweet ricotta, almonds, and chocolate chips.

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.desc: Ladyfinger cookies dipped in coffee liqueur and espresso, layered in a sweet cream Mascarpone cheese, and coated with dark cocoa.
